item.title: SaltConf 2021 - SaltStack Config Session
item.description: I will be doing a SaltConf presentation for the first time at SaltConf 2021. I attended SaltConf 2020 for the first time after VMware purchased SaltStack Config.

item.title: VMworld 2021 - SaltStack Config Session
item.description: Manage Windows Workloads Through vRealize Automation SaltStack Config [MCL1895] I will be doing a VMworld presentation for the first time at VMworld 2021.

item.title: How to use PowerShell Modules with vRA 8.2
item.description: Options to use PowerShell Modules I like to review VMware vRA (vRealize Automation) 8.2 as a Microsoft Windows Server Admin.
